fields.question: What's the Difference between "My Organizations" and "Related Organizations", displayed on the personal Profile Page?
fields.answer:
"My Organizations" is the List of the Organizations, created (authored) by the logged in User.
"Related Organizations" is the List of the Organizations, where the logged in User is a Staff and/or Group Member.

fields.question: What are the "Groups", as seen on the Organization Details Page?
fields.answer:
Author and Staff Members of the Organization can create Groups and invite there other Users from:
  • Organization's "Groups" Tab;
  • User's Profile Page.
The "Groups" may be very useful for the "hidden" Organizations, as long as only Staff and Group Members will be able: to see the Organization's Activity & Details; to see the Details and participate in Challenges, created on behalf of the hidden Organization; etc.
In other Words, it provides full Control over the hidden Organization's Privacy.

fields.question: Send Newsletter Functionality: when, to whom, etc?
fields.answer:
Author and Staff Members of the Organization can create and send the Organization's Newsletter.
It will be sent out to all of the Organization's Subscribers.

fields.question:
What are the "Complaints" (for Accounts, Challenges, and Organizations)?
Is it a type of flagging System?
Are Comments, tracking and Complaints Resolution Process given?
fields.answer:
After a Challenge has been completed, the User (Participant) can complain about the Challenge itself, Organization on behalf of what it was created, and other Participants.
This will create a System Report, Platform Administrators will be notified, and appropriate Actions will be taken a Place.

fields.question:
If adding a Challenge, there are multiple Date Options: "Dateless" or "Onetime", and the Options "Weekly", "Monthly", "Annually", "Custom", which are currently show strike-through.
Do you plan to allow for repetitive Times?
What's the Plan with the other strike-through Options?
fields.answer:
Yes, the recurring Challenges Functionality is in Development Stage.
This Feature allows to create the recurring Challenges on Weekly, Monthly, Annually, or custom Basis.
Next recurring Challenge will be created and posted automatically.

fields.question:
Adding a "hidden" Organization.
Will completed Challenges of the hidden Organization show up on the public Profile of User?
fields.answer:
They won't show up by default.
They will be visible only to the logged in Users, which are the Staff and/or Group Members of the same hidden Organization.
